metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11945 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Squid before 5.0.2. A remote attacker can replaya sniffed Digest Authentication nonce to gain access to resources that areotherwise forbidden. This occurs because the attacker can overflow thenonce reference counter (a short integer). Remote code execution may occurif the pooled token credentials are freed (instead of replayed as validcredentials).

criterions.comment: squid3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
